ca.ualberta.cs.c301_teamproject
Class CreateTask

java.lang.Object
  Activity
      ca.ualberta.cs.c301_teamproject.CreateTask

public class CreateTask
extends Activity

This class is responsible for grabbing all of the information needed for creating a task then passes it off to the repository for creation.

topched

updateItemList

public void updateItemList(int position)
When a item is clicked on the list view. Grabs the information for the item and then passes that off to CreateItem for editing. When it returns to this activity onActivityResult will be called with requestCode = 2

Parameters:
position - Position of list item clicked
